message: I wrap my arm around his head and pull him into my chest.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Just shut up and behave."
He resists at first, but after a bit, he gives up and awkwardly leans into me.
I hold his head firmly to my chest.
Perhaps my warmth will say what my words can't.
When I was a kid, and I'd start to cry, Granny would always do this for me.
I'd feel her warmth, and before I knew it, I would be calm.
Maybe it'll work on him.
I mean, he's never really felt warmth, right?

name: 蒼葉
message: "If I could teach you one thing, it'd be this: that maybe... just maybe, the world isn't quite as awful as you think it is."

name: ノイズ
message: "I don't care what the world's like."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, that's just because you don't know about it. There's all sorts of stuff you don't know."

name: ノイズ
message: "Why would I need to know?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "To put it in terms you can understand, you'd have something to gain: knowledge."

name: ノイズ
message: "So... I guess you'll teach me these things?"
I look at Noiz, a little surprised.
I never imagined hearing something like that from his mouth.
Feeling a gentle warmth come over me, I squeeze his head a little tighter.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, let's see. Maybe if you promise to think about how I feel, and not to do anything stupid anymore."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, I am older than you."

name: ノイズ
message: "Now you're acting like a dick."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut up."
I can't help but smile.
I feel like I finally understand Noiz a little, and that makes me happy.

name: ノイズ
message: "...It's getting kinda hot."
I take my hand off his head and he sits up on the floor.
I sit up too and lean back against a nearby shelf.

name: 蒼葉
message: "So, is it a promise?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I didn't make any promise. Don't wanna. Maybe if I feel like it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then maybe I'll never get to teach you."

name: ノイズ
message: "Fine by me."
Well, Noiz being stubborn is nothing new...
Still, is it just me, or is he suddenly avoiding eye contact?
Wait... is he embarrassed?
Maybe he really did hear some of what I said.
